item.title: For my money, Jump Space is the most impressive indie launch of the year - Destructoid
item.description:
1. For my money, Jump Space is the most impressive indie launch of the year  Destructoid

  3. Jump Space, the co-op spaceship crew-'em-up we warned you was fun, just launched in early access and it's already turning heads  PC Gamer
  4. With the action of Helldivers 2 and No Man's Sky's planet hopping, one of Steam's most-anticipated indies is finally here  PCGamesN
  5. This sci-fi co-op FPS has already blown past 1 million wishlists, and after grappling through the void myself I can see why  GamesRadar+
